GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.15.53
GSD.description:
net: tun: stop NAPI when detaching queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit 92e4f3ee5831e025a5bcd81782b1d41b27a90c52, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 943170998b200190f99d3fe7e771437e2c51f319. For more details please see the references link.
